name: ANB16
author: Anubi
description:
Originally
 made as a palette for one of my asset packs, ANB16 contains 6 color 
ramps (Gray, Pink, Red, Green, Blue and Brown) distributed along 16 
different color values, with interchangeable colors along them (such as 
the orange/yellow colors, which can be used for the brown ramp, or the 
darkest "blue", which can be used in all ramps but brown). Made to be as
 general-use as it can be, while also being restricted by the amount of 
colors on it. Because it was originally made for one of my asset packs, 
it has a saturated look to it, which should make your art pop-out.
